name: MyDaybook-Diary,Journal,NoteAssistantSkill
0:
”Alexa, open My Daybook”
”Alexa, ask My Daybook to Help”
”Alexa, ask My Daybook to Write”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my daybook
Developer Terms of Use
des:
My Daybook is a cloud-based diary, journal and notes skill designed to record activities, experiences, thoughts, and ideas throughout a day. My Daybook skill is an extension to Daybook app available on Android, IOS and Web. My Daybook skill allows the user to add, retrieve journal entries through Alexa. Entries added will sync across multiple platforms - Mobile, Tablet or web. Please visit https://www.daybook.app to know more.

Tips to use Alexa Daybook skill:

> Open My Daybook - Alexa, Open My Daybook
> Write - Alexa, ask My Daybook to Write
> Search - Alexa, ask My Daybook to Search
> Search with a word - Example: Alexa, ask My Daybook to Search Anniversary
> Search with time - Example: Alexa, ask My Daybook to Search last week
> Play the latest journal - Alexa, ask My Daybook to Play
